job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a person to lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization to drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions across our products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used within Uber globally!

   What You Will Do
     * Develop creative solutions and build prototypes for security, risk, and compliance problems using algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization, and work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
     * Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
     * Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
     * Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
     * Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
     * Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) for risk and compliance use cases
job_details.full_text:
Senior AI/ML Application Developer

We are looking for a person to lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization to drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions across our products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used within Uber globally!

   What You Will Do
     * Develop creative solutions and build prototypes for security, risk, and compliance problems using algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization, and work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
     * Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
     * Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
     * Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
     * Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
     * Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) for risk and compliance use cases

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing and deploying AI-enabled solutions, specifically mentioning Generative AI, LLMs, and building tools for training and evaluating them. While it touches on ML model optimization and data analysis, the core focus on applying GenAI to build and deploy solutions, alongside software development aspects for production, aligns best with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization' directly relates to the creation and application of models.
job_tasks.phrase: algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization

job_tasks.phrase: Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
